secondary_endpoints: Progression-free survival; Objective response rate; Quality of life (EORTC QLQ-C30)
inclusion_criteria: Age 18-75; Histologically confirmed NSCLC; PD-L1 positive (≥50%); ECOG 0-1
exclusion_criteria: Prior immunotherapy; Active autoimmune disease; Brain metastases

primary_endpoint: Reduction in infarct size by cardiac MRI at 7 days
secondary_endpoints: MACE at 30 days; Biomarker levels (troponin I CK-MB); Left ventricular ejection fraction
inclusion_criteria: Age 18-80; STEMI within 12 hours; Planned PCI; No prior MI
exclusion_criteria: Cardiogenic shock; Severe renal impairment (eGFR <30); Prior CABG

primary_endpoint: Change in ADAS-Cog score from baseline to month 18
secondary_endpoints: CDR-SB; Amyloid PET imaging; Plasma p-tau217 levels; ADCS-ADL
inclusion_criteria: Age 55-85; Mild cognitive impairment or mild AD; Amyloid positive PET; MMSE 20-26
exclusion_criteria: Severe depression; Other neurodegenerative diseases; Anticoagulation therapy

primary_endpoint: Mean change in HbA1c from baseline to week 52
secondary_endpoints: Fasting plasma glucose; Body weight change; Incidence of hypoglycemia
inclusion_criteria: Age 18-70; HbA1c 7.5-10.5%; BMI 25-40; Failed metformin monotherapy
exclusion_criteria: Type 1 diabetes; Severe hepatic impairment; History of pancreatitis

primary_endpoint: Maximum tolerated dose and dose-limiting toxicities
inclusion_criteria: Age ≥18; Unresectable stage III or IV melanoma; Failed prior anti-PD-1; ECOG 0-2
exclusion_criteria: Active CNS metastases; Prior anti-LAG-3 therapy; Autoimmune requiring steroids >10mg/day

secondary_endpoints: FEV1 improvement; ACQ-6 score; Blood eosinophil count; FeNO levels
inclusion_criteria: Age 18-75; Severe uncontrolled asthma; ≥2 exacerbations in past year; ICS + LABA
exclusion_criteria: Smoking >10 pack-years; Active lung infection; Parasitic infection

primary_endpoint: Change in average daily pain score (0-10 NRS) at week 12
secondary_endpoints: Patient Global Impression of Change; Sleep quality; QOL (SF-36)
inclusion_criteria: Age 18-80; Diabetes >1 year; Diabetic peripheral neuropathy; Pain score ≥4/10
exclusion_criteria: Severe renal disease; Other painful conditions; Opioid dependence

secondary_endpoints: DAS28-CRP; HAQ-DI; Radiographic progression; Fatigue scale
inclusion_criteria: Age 18-70; Active RA (≥6 swollen ≥6 tender joints); Failed ≥1 DMARD; RF or anti-CCP positive
exclusion_criteria: Previous biologic failure; Active infection; Malignancy within 5 years

primary_endpoint: Safety and tolerability; Changes in gut microbiome composition
secondary_endpoints: Clinical remission rate; Endoscopic improvement; Fecal calprotectin
inclusion_criteria: Age 18-65; Moderate to severe UC; Mayo score 6-12; Failed conventional therapy
exclusion_criteria: Crohn's disease; C. difficile infection; Immunosuppression

secondary_endpoints: HBV DNA suppression; ALT normalization; Anti-HBs seroconversion
inclusion_criteria: Age 18-65; Chronic HBV >6 months; HBeAg negative; Compensated liver disease
exclusion_criteria: Cirrhosis; Co-infection with HCV or HIV; Prior nucleoside analog failure
